mapper.select: /* PK 자동증가 코드 */ SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT(#{tableName},1) ELSE CONCAT(#{tableName},max(cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${columnName}, #{tableName}, -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END ) as newGoodsCode FROM ${tableName};

/*그룹 자동증가 코드*/ SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT(#{codeName}, '_group_', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d'), '_',1) ELSE CONCAT(#{codeName}, '_group_', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d'), '_', max(cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(${columnName}, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) END ) as newGroupCode FROM ${tableName} WHERE ${columnName} LIKE CONCAT(#{codeName}, '_group_', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d'), '_%') and NOT (purchase_history_code = #{PKkey});
